hero__info.p-stadia: I welcome you, I hope you enjoy your

aboutme.description: If you need a creative, self-taught, proactive person who can solve problems and take leadership when needed, that person is me.

proyect-1.description: Hotel page where you can see, filter and search for hotels, in addition to having a reservation section added to a user registration and login system

proyect-2.description: Web based on the famous PokeApi, where you can search for Pokemons by name and type

proyect-4.description: Web application based on the Rick And Morty API

proyect-5.description: Web with which you can know the weather of your city in real time

proyect-6.description: First React Application, with which I learned its fundamental bases
